Name: StarReturnDemoStarter
Notes: Creates and controls the sequence used when the player returns to a HUB world with a Power Star. It does not appear initially, but it can appear through cutscene actions.

Rail.Description: The fly-in path used at the start of the cutscene.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. It tries to register to the cutscenes with the names グランドスター帰還[２回目以降], パワースター帰還, パワースター帰還[NPC紹介], パワースター帰還[アイテム惑星] and パワースター帰還[初回].
